last_episode_to_air.name: Updates: Benny
last_episode_to_air.overview: Decades of hoarding isolates Benny from his family.

name: Hoarding: Buried Alive
overview: Hoarding: Buried Alive is an American documentary television series that premiered on TLC on March 14, 2010. The show follows hoarders through their life experiences and helps them learn to manage their illness.

episodes.name: Hoarders: Buried Alive
episodes.overview: Compulsive hoarding is a mental illness that causes people to accumulate an excessive amount of clutter within their homes. Delve into the lives of two women whose houses and families are being overrun by their things. Can they dig out of the mess?

episodes.name: Welcome to My Nightmare
episodes.overview: Extreme hoarders' lives spiral out of control as their possessions jeopardize their chances for a happy family life.

episodes.name: Beyond Embarrassment
episodes.overview: A man, 55, plans to abandon his hoard and move in with his mother, who is also a hoarder; a woman risks having her house condemned due to her hoarding.

episodes.name: Paralyzed by Clutter
episodes.overview: An extreme hoarder is in denial; a woman who has trouble discarding belongings fears that she's passing down her compulsion to her son.

episodes.name: Life On Fire
episodes.overview: Extreme hoarders face losing their homes and living in isolation.

episodes.name: Family Secrets
episodes.overview: Two women seek help for their compulsive hoarding problems.

episodes.name: Filling the Void
episodes.overview: Hoarding is both a comfort and a curse for two lonely women trying to find the strength to change.

episodes.name: No One Would Choose This
episodes.overview: Two women must get their compulsive hoarding under control or face eviction from their homes and alienation from their families.

episodes.name: Everything Is at Stake
episodes.overview: Two women's compulsive hoarding is crowding out their loved ones.

episodes.name: A Million Excuses
episodes.overview: Hoarding by parents threatens to rip a family apart unless they can stop their excessive collecting. A man must learn to control his addiction to buying items at auctions and garage sales.

episodes.name: Homeless Man with a House
episodes.overview: Season 2 opens as two hoarders get help after decades of compulsive behavior that has driven their loved ones away.

episodes.name: Robbing the Kids…
episodes.overview: Two moms who are hoarders get help after realizing their obsessions are tearing their families apart.

episodes.name: Prison of Garbage
episodes.overview: Two women who started hoarding in the wake of personal tragedies try to put an end to their compulsive behavior.

episodes.name: Everything's Junk
episodes.overview: A woman who started hoarding after surviving Sept. 11 seeks help.

episodes.name: Battle with Chaos
episodes.overview: If two hoarders don't change soon, they could lose everything they love.

episodes.name: How Do I Get Out of This
episodes.overview: A woman's excessive hoarding has caused her family to fall apart.

episodes.name: The Scariest Place on Earth
episodes.overview: If a compulsive hoarder can't clean his house, he will go to jail.

episodes.name: The Mess I've Created
episodes.overview: A woman's compulsive hoarding almost cost her husband his life.

episodes.name: This Is Where You Sleep
episodes.overview: A woman turned to hoarding after a shocking confession ended her marriage.

episodes.name: Nowhere Near Normal
episodes.overview: Extreme Hoarder Jahn struggles to clear her belongings from not one, but two houses before both are condemned.

episodes.name: I Want to Cuss
episodes.overview: Compulsive hoarder Sharon gets caught stealing from her neighbor's home while Len must choose between his hoard and his daughter.

episodes.name: Oh My Gosh
episodes.overview: Conditions inside Tammy's home have become so bad, that she's forced to eat her meals in the car and her sick father is unable to return home from the hospital.

episodes.name: Better Get a Dumpster
episodes.overview: A woman's out of control obsession with bikinis, sweaters and dresses threatens to destroy her relationship with her only daughter.

episodes.name: Overwhelming Pile of Junk
episodes.overview: After decades of hoarding, Debbie has not only lost the comforts of home but the company of her four children as well. Chip's compulsive hoarding has forced his family of six to squeeze into 1600 square feet of living space.

episodes.name: My Biggest Embarrassment
episodes.overview: While Patti's extreme hoarding has made it virtually impossible for her daughter to live with her, Jonathan's obsession has kept his three-year-old son from even coming in the door.

episodes.name: It's Out of Control
episodes.overview: Decades of extreme hoarding have put Kay's marriage in serious jeopardy while Toni's compulsive shopping has made her own home a danger zone for her two-year-old granddaughter.

episodes.name: Like a Dog in a Cage
episodes.overview: A mother desperately tries to protect her children from their father's hoard, while an artist chooses frogs, penguins and banana peels over her live-in boyfriend.

episodes.name: It's a Freaking War Zone
episodes.overview: The tumbling piles of Maggie's collections are putting her own son's life at risk while Bob's all consuming passion for swimming pool parts is pushing his family to the brink.

episodes.name: Surviving on Trash
episodes.overview: Pregnant with her first child, Traci is desperate to move back into her childhood home. But it's filled floor to ceiling with her mother's stuff. Now the two must work together to clear a decades worth of clutter before it's too late.

episodes.name: There Are Mice Everywhere
episodes.overview: Compulsive hoarder Kathleen discovers a hoard of mice living in her kitchen numbering in the thousands. And for extreme hoarder Jaime's future son-in-law, spending the night in a hoard might very well end a marriage before it even begins.

episodes.name: Not a Safe Place
episodes.overview: A woman with OCD is unable to throw away anything. A mother and daughter's house is so trashed they must eat dinner in their car every night.

episodes.name: A Horrible Sight
episodes.overview: Hoarders whose homes have been condemned must clean up or risk losing them.

episodes.name: I Was Gonna Gag
episodes.overview: A hoarder faces losing his children if he does not clean his home.

episodes.name: Stop Touching My Stuff
episodes.overview: Parents of a teenage hoarder hope a visit by an extreme hoarder will change their daughter's ways.

episodes.name: Overtaken By Puppets
episodes.overview: A former ventriloquist has let her past career become an obsession. A man is having problems being a good father for his daughter as she isn't allowed in his home due to his excessive hoarding.

episodes.name: I Can't Breathe
episodes.overview: A woman is in danger of losing custody of her ten year old daughter unless she can change her hoarding ways.

episodes.name: Tiny Monsters
episodes.overview: Sherry's hoard has broken up her marriage. Now, authorities are threatening to take away her children and condemn her home. With only weeks to clean it up, Sherry could lose everything she loves.

episodes.name: My House Can Kill Me
episodes.overview: Miranda's hoarding has escalated to the point that her toddlers have no place to play safely. Hsi-Ming's daughter is concerned that her mother's hoarding is threatening her safety and health.

episodes.name: Owned By The Roaches
episodes.overview: A psychologist who is accustomed to diagnosing other people's problems can not solve her own hoarding problems and it has escalated to the point where millions of roaches infest her home.

episodes.name: I'm Dumbfounded
episodes.overview: A marriage is in trouble after years of hoarding and secrets kept by a woman from her husband.

episodes.name: It's Just Sex
episodes.overview: Secret hoarding by a couple is complicated by revelations about their relationship and sex lives, which could threaten their marriage and cost them their home.

episodes.name: Worst I've Ever Seen
episodes.overview: A municipality is ready to tear down a home unless a hoarding issue is addressed; a woman's attachment to her things could break up her family.

episodes.name: A Bomb Went Off
episodes.overview: A woman with a lung disease fears her hoarding is making her condition worse; a woman's clutter limits her mobility in her house, while her neighbors complain about her garbage bags piling up outside.

episodes.name: Unbelievable
episodes.overview: Brad's hoarding has taken over his mobile home; Mary has been evicted and has just weeks to clean out her stuff.

episodes.name: Are You Serious?
episodes.overview: A woman's hoarding may have done irreparable damage to her relationship with her daughter; a woman realizes she needs help after years of collecting have rendered her home uninhabitable.

episodes.name: This is Garbage Land
episodes.overview: Cary's paralyzing obsession with Elvis memorabilia has left his New York City apartment virtually uninhabitable.

episodes.name: As Bad as It Gets
episodes.overview: After over twenty years in the same apartment, compulsive hoarder Randy is being forced to leave by order of his landlord. With only days to accomplish the task, Randy must somehow clear out the eight-foot-high mountains of stuff.

episodes.name: Sleeping in a Dumpster
episodes.overview: Laura’s collecting has spiraled into a compulsion that has left the relationships with her two sons on the brink of collapse. When a potentially devastating house fire ignites during her clean-up effort, it puts everyone’s safety in jeopardy.

episodes.name: This is Unreal
episodes.overview: A man's love for shopping became a compulsion after his mother's death and his home is starting to show the effects.

episodes.name: Just Tear It Down
episodes.overview: A couple's home is packed due to their hoarding and they face the real threat of eviction unless they can clean up and fix all the damage caused by their out of control collecting.

episodes.name: Twenty Of Everything
episodes.overview: Thirty years of hoarding have filled a man's home to the point that he sleeps outside in a bed he put together.

episodes.name: Hoo, That Reeks!
episodes.overview: Kathy’s extreme hoarding forced her 12-year-old son to move out of their home. Five years later, their relationship is at a crossroad. Now Kathy must make a drastic change or risk losing her son forever.

episodes.name: A Humongous Secret
episodes.overview: A man quit drinking in the past and switched to collecting that escalated to hoarding and now faces the possibility of losing everything unless he changes his ways.

episodes.name: It's My Junk
episodes.overview: When Eileen admits a dark secret to her family, the situation quickly escalates beyond hoarding to a matter of life and death. Compulsive hoarder Dale has packed not one, but five houses full of clutter.

episodes.name: You're Not Taking My Kids
episodes.overview: A woman's custody of her children is at stake unless she can clean up her home in two days.

episodes.name: Holding Mom Hostage
episodes.overview: An ill-tempered man fills his 93-year-old mother's house with clutter after moving back in with her.

episodes.name: This House Killer Her
episodes.overview: Three siblings sift through the clutter in their deceased mother's house with spiritual guidance from a medium.

episodes.name: She Wants It, She Takes It
episodes.overview: A woman must live in a camper in her backyard because her house is so cluttered with things she's found in dumpsters, but her neighbors are threatening to sue unless she cleans it up in a hurry.

episodes.name: What A Pig
episodes.overview: Compulsive hoarder Valerie risks eviction when her next-door neighbor reports her to the health department. Meanwhile, Ann's house is so filled with clutter that she has been reduced to a 3 sq. ft space in her living room.

episodes.name: They're Crawling
episodes.overview: A woman has a problem admitting she has a hoarding problem.

episodes.name: One Is Good Two Is Better
episodes.overview: A former top model is hiding a dark secret -- she is a compulsive hoarder.

episodes.name: She's Going to Jail
episodes.overview: A woman's past hoarding has resulted in her going to jail and she faces the same possibility again unless she changes her ways. Home owners come to the startling revelation that the home they have purchased is full of junk left by the previous occupant.

episodes.name: I'm a Rockstar, Baby!
episodes.overview: A Canadian rock singer faces the possibility of losing his family unless he can declutter the large amount of memorabilia and other items he has accumulated over the years.

episodes.name: Losing Half Myself
episodes.overview: Two identical twins are hoarders of the same type of items and face the reality of changing their ways or facing the consequences.

episodes.name: Leading a Double Life
episodes.overview: The lives of a woman and her children are being affected detrimentally by the hoarding of their landlord, who lives above them.

episodes.name: Somewhere in My Pile
episodes.overview: A woman's hoarding tendencies has filled her house with clutter and her three dogs may be a barrier to her cleaning up the home.

episodes.name: Waste Not, Want Not
episodes.overview: The murder of a daughter has led a mother to hoard since that trauma to the point it is a danger to herself. A couple leads a seemingly idyllic life but hold a secret of mass hoarding behind the doors of their home.

episodes.name: Current Season (as of 2013-03-13) is Season 4
episodes.overview: TLC sometimes has split seasons, so numbering can get messed up. According to TVRage, Amazon, Wikipedia, and the TV Guide the current season is 4.

episodes.name: Holding Mom Hostage
episodes.overview: A landlord's secret hoard is a threat to a woman and her children, who lives downstairs. The hoarding is to blame for mold, mice and flea infestations.

episodes.name: This House Killed Her
episodes.overview: After their mother's death, siblings Aimee, Cheryl and Jimmy are left to deal with a house filled with clutter; they bring the aid of a medium to help locate important documents.

episodes.name: She Wants It, She Takes It
episodes.overview: Rhonda's home is filled with items she's found in the dumpster; neighbors are threatening lawsuits.

episodes.name: What a Pig
episodes.overview: Compulsive hoarder Valerie risks eviction when her next-door neighbor reports her to the health department; Ann's house is so filled with clutter she has been reduced to a small space in her living room.

episodes.name: They're Crawling
episodes.overview: Kay denies she is a hoarder but her cluttered home with deadly vermin tells another story.

episodes.name: One Is Good. Two Is Better
episodes.overview: Louise and her lavish hoarding could end up on the street.

episodes.name: She's Going to Jail
episodes.overview: A woman has been sent to jail four times for her hoarding; people purchase a house only to discover it comes with a hoard.

episodes.name: I'm a Rockstar, Baby!
episodes.overview: Kelly Jay's massive hoarding issues.

episodes.name: Losing Half Myself
episodes.overview: Phyllis and Patty aren't just identical twins, they are identical hoarders as well.

episodes.name: Leading a Double Life
episodes.overview: Lalie and her children suffer from mold, mice and flea infestations due to their upstairs neighbor and landlord, Denise, who is a massive hoarder.

episodes.name: Somewhere in My Pile
episodes.overview: Beverly's clutter has filled up her entire home and her three beloved dogs have helped make the space completely unlivable.

episodes.name: Waste Not, Want Not
episodes.overview: Terry and Bill seem to be the perfect couple; the murder of her daughter has led Nancy to hoard.

episodes.name: The Last Clear Spot
episodes.overview: Jessica is a little person with dangerous toppling piles of clutter; along with her mother she has filled her entire home.

episodes.name: Full of Rats
episodes.overview: Property investors purchase a house that is occupied by a hoarder; rat infestation compromises the building's foundation.

episodes.name: You're Gonna Die in Here
episodes.overview: After being the target of a school shooting a former principal's life has changed; paralyzed by PTSD and hoarding Wayne has abandoned his family.

episodes.name: My Teeth Are Lost in the Pile
episodes.overview: A wife has transformed one couple's home into a heap of trash; on the verge of foreclosure.

episodes.name: It's A Horror Story
episodes.overview: Frank didn't expect Susan to fill his house with clutter when she moved in; though her home of forty-eight years sits condemned just two blocks away.

episodes.name: Running Out of Time
episodes.overview: Geoffrey lost his home and has 30 days to clear the clutter or he will lose everything left inside.

episodes.name: A VCR for Every Day of the Week
episodes.overview: A father and son who both hoard; one faces jail time while the other could lose his newborn son.

episodes.name: Three Apartments, Three Hoarders
episodes.overview: An apartment complex with three extreme hoarders; the building is now under strict management.

episodes.name: The Donald Trump of Hoarding
episodes.overview: Mike is about to undergo surgery to save his life; the biohazards in his home threaten his recovery.

episodes.name: We're Gonna Need a Bigger Boat
episodes.overview: Ken's girlfriend is giving him one last chance to clear out; Lea could lose her children if she cannot clean her clutter.

episodes.name: Worse Than a Haunted House
episodes.overview: A mother's battling with hoarding discovers her own daughters compulsion; a family's unity at risk.

episodes.name: A Graveyard of Junk
episodes.overview: If Seymour cannot clear his roach-infested home, he will be left homeless when the city condemns it.

episodes.name: The Stench is Amazing
episodes.overview: Tim's inheritance is dwindling and he risks losing his home; twin brothers Lorrin and Orin face a similar predicament.

episodes.name: It's a Rat's Nest
episodes.overview: Doug stands to lose two houses filled with clutter if he doesn't control his compulsion to collect.

episodes.name: Diagnosis Bipolar
episodes.overview: 16-year-old Haley struggles with hoarding and bipolar disorder.

episodes.name: Diagnosis PTSD
episodes.overview: Wayne is paralyzed by PTSD and compulsive hoarding.

6.status_message: The resource you requested could not be found.
